i18n.name: Tingyuan Yao
i18n.resumeInfo1: Hello! I'm Tingyuan Yao, just a guy who loves to piece together stories frame by frame. My work is all about finding the rhythm in the footage and crafting a tale that feels genuine and engaging. I'm constantly learning and experimenting because each video is a new adventure. Let's tell a story that feels real and keeps the audience hooked!
i18n.resumeInfo2: For more information please download my resume!
